message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
I'm still a bit far from $10,500. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
